page.title: 18Swimming
page.content: The nearest public indoor swimming pools are at Tunbridge Wellls and Hastings. Our local secondary school, Uplands Community College, Wadhurst has an outdoor pool that is made available during the summer holidays. We do not have a swimming pool at our school but are able to use the pool at Uplands during the summer term. This year we had eight one hour sessions which were used by the two older classes. We travel by coach hired from a Ticehurst firm. This year for the first time parents were invited to donate Â£1 per child towards the cost of swimming. We think school swimming is important because in the three younger classes there are only 13 children who can swim but in the two older classes 55 children can swim.
